alert.note: Alert for Caroline (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 2:53PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of central Caroline County through 345 PM EDT... At 252 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Milford, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibilty and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Milford around 305 PM EDT. Bowling Green around 315 PM EDT. Fort A.p. Hill around 325 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Rappahannock Academy, Golansville, Villboro, Nancy Wrights Corner, Guinea, Corbin, Cedar Fork, Ruther Glen, Woodford and Penola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
